name: Cake for Traveler
desc:
A gift given to a very special someone on a very special day.

Here's to you, the symphony and echoes amidst verdant trees.
Wishing you happiness and peace in your sweet dreams.

customize.name: Cake for Traveler
customize.desc:
A gift given to a very special someone on a very special day.

Here's to you, the symphony and echoes amidst verdant trees.
Wishing you happiness and peace in your sweet dreams.

customize.text: is used, the player receives a

customize.name: Fragile Resin
customize.desc:
An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.

This crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin. The flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in the world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

customize.text:
and a copy of the cake as a memento. Its description also changes to the following:
<color=#ffffff>New Description</color>
A gift given to a very special someone on a very special day.
Here's to you, the symphony and echoes amidst the verdant trees.
May you find happiness and peace in your sweet dreams.
"Recommended dishes will be updated on a weekly basis, and the moon will shower us with new blessings each month, but wow, it'll be almost nine thousand hours before we can celebrate this day again! Hee-hee, let Paimon play you the music from that score on top of the cake. You'd better not make fun of Paimon's performance, cus she's been practicing it for ages!"

value.text: Log in to Genshin Impact on your birthday from September 28, 2023 - September 27, 2024
